translations: n.生黑色素细胞（melanocyte 的复数）

phrs.translation: 黑色素细胞, 黑素细胞, 色素细胞, 黑色素母细胞
无黑素性黑素细胞, 黑素细胞, 毛囊无色素黑素细胞, 无色素黑素细胞
人黑色素细胞, 胎儿

sentences.sentence: One for Kipling, perhaps. “How the jaguar got his melanocytes.
sentences.translation: 也许吉卜林会说“让美洲虎长上了黑色素”。

sentences.sentence: One for Kipling, perhaps. “How the jaguar got his melanocytes.”
sentences.translation: 这问题可能要交给吉卜林了：“美洲虎为何是黑色？”

sentences.sentence: People with freckles have a normal number of melanocytes; their melanocytes just create clusters of melanin.
sentences.translation: 有雀斑的人呢，他们的黑色素细胞数量是正常的，只是他们的黑色素细胞产生了一些黑素。
